'''Beta 1.21.130.28''' (ChromeOS, Android) or '''Preview 1.21.130.28''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox, PlayStation) is the sixth and final beta and seventh and final ''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.130]], released on November 18, 2025,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/41193948702733-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-130-28|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.130.28|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=November 18, 2025}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
[[File:Zombie Horse BE3.png|32px]] '''[[Zombie Horse]]'''
* No longer spawns on [[Peaceful]] difficulty.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.130.28 Preview
|;old
|228176|Restarting the game after signing out signs the user back in when signed in before
|229154|Vibrant Visuals setting is not available on Android devices using newer Adreno 722 GPUs
|;dev
|230871|Neither Netherite Horse Armor nor Netherite Nautilus Armor provide knockback resistance
|231485|Game crashes on launch when the "Improved Input Response" option is enabled
|231518|Repeated activation of LT and RT trigger buttons on Xbox
|otherissuescount=2}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed an issue where IME Candidates would appear in the wrong monitor or misplaced in relation to text field.
* Fixed blocks with the {{cd|tick}} component not ticking when placed via a [[Jigsaw structure]].</onlyinclude>
